👋 About Me

Hello! I'm Brendan, a passionate computer science student with a deep fascination for graphics programming and creative technologies. I love bridging the gap between artistic vision and technical implementation, whether that's building VFX tools for artists or creating games. When I'm not diving into code, you'll find me practicing violin 🎻, playing casual ice hockey 🏒, or getting lost in a good book 📚.
